title: ipv4
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

asn.description: The ASN to which the IPv4 address is currently assigned.

latlong.description: The best known latitude/longitude for the node.

loc.description: The geo-political location string for the IPv4.

place.description: The geo:place associated with the latlong property.

type.description: The type of IP address (e.g., private, multicast, etc.).

dns:rev.description: The most current DNS reverse lookup for the IPv4.
